name: Pears Baked With Roquefort Cheese
keywords: appetizer, dessert, bartlett pear, roquefort cheese, walnut, fall, gluten-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons Roquefort cheese, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the walnuts, cheese and lemon juice in a bowl, mashing the ingredients together to make a paste.

Peel, halve and core the pears. Stuff the cavity of each pear half with a spoonful of the Roquefort mixture, mounding it up slightly. Place the stuffed pears in a shallow baking dish and pour the wine around them.
Bake about 30 minutes, until the pears are tender. Allow to cool about 20 minutes before serving.
